description: Access customer conversations, tickets, and user data in real-time
author: Intercom
content: Connect Claude to Intercom for customer support operations and conversation management.

steps: Add the Intercom server configuration with SSE or HTTP transport

installation.claudeCode: claude mcp add --transport sse intercom https://mcp.intercom.com/sse

troubleshooting.issue: HTTP 429 Too Many Requests - rate limit hit
troubleshooting.solution: Private apps: 10,000 calls/min per app, 25,000/min per workspace. Public apps same limits. Check X-RateLimit-Reset header for reset time. Implement exponential backoff when approaching X-RateLimit-Remaining threshold.
Verify API key is valid and copied correctly from Intercom settings. Check Authorization header format: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY. Regenerate API key from Intercom Developer Hub if authentication fails.

troubleshooting.issue: Cannot access conversations or customer data
troubleshooting.solution: Verify workspace permissions grant access to conversations. Check team member role has necessary permissions. For private apps, confirm OAuth scope includes required access (read_conversations, write_conversations).

troubleshooting.issue: Webhook requests timing out or failing
troubleshooting.solution: Note: rate limits apply only to REST API, not webhooks. Verify webhook endpoint is accessible and responds within 15 seconds. Check webhook signature for security validation.
